open-chest: You found the key chest open!
closed-door: Try to find a GOLD key!
closed-big-door: Find GOLD key to open door!
game-help-debug:
No damage is taken while swinging the sword.
Quest: Find the sword by following the south path.
impenetrable-forrest: This forest is too scary. You cannot enter. Enter only by the path.
game-controls:
Keyboard:
I - open/close player inventory.
Space bar - to swing sword.
M - open game main menu.
W - move player up.
S - move player down.
A - move player left.
D - move player right.
F - player sprint.
